item.title: Our Presskit
item.description: You can find our Presskit right here by clicking on the link.

item.title: Who are We
item.description: TheFifthWaffle is an independent game company founded and operated by three brothers. Initially finding success at local gamejams and hackathons, they decided to put their skills to use as a team with one on music, one on lead programming, one on backup programming, and all on art. Their first game, GunFu Heroes, will be a loveletter to the games they played together as kids.
